member.name: T:EnergyTrading.Contracts.Atom.Link
member.summary:
Simple representation of an Atom link, sufficient to be included in an XML message.
Atom is not fully representable in XML schema, but this form gives us enough to use the link element.

member.name: P:EnergyTrading.Contracts.Atom.Link.Uri
member.summary:
Gets or sets the target href.
atom:link elements MUST have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference

member.name: P:EnergyTrading.Contracts.Atom.Link.Rel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the link relationship type; optional.
Elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link relation type. If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

member.name: P:EnergyTrading.Contracts.Atom.Link.Type
member.summary:
Gets or sets the link type.
the "type" attribute's value is an advisory media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is dereferenced. Note that the type attribute does not override the actual media type returned with the representation. Link elements MAY have a type attribute, whose value MUST conform to the syntax of a MIME media type [MIMEREG].
